actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to authorize payment under the supplementary medical insurance program for home hemodialysis performed by a nurse or health aid.

summary.text: Authorizes the payment under the supplementary medical insurance program of the Social Security Act for home hemodialysis performed by a nurse or health aide. (Amends 42 U.S.C. 1395x (s))

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to authorize payment under the supplementary medical insurance program for home hemodialysis performed by a nurse or health aid.
